item.description:
Optimum Health Solution with Healthy Living Magazine present

Dr. Brian Clement, N.M.D., Ph.D., L.N., author, international lecturer and director of Hippocrates Health Institute.  Dr.Clement will discuss his new book..."7 Keys to Lifelong Sexual Vitality" - a holistic approach to explain how sex (and the transformative emotions associated with it) is invariably connected to a person's physical and emotional well-being at every stage of adulthood.

 

Register online at www.MyHealthyLivingMag.com. Come early to have a good seat and enjoy delicious smoothies on sale to benefit "Real Kids Real Food". Cost $10 on-line or $15 at the door. A Portion of the proceeds will be donated to "Real Kids Real Food" www.realkidsrealfood.org. For more info email betsy.bragg6@gmail.com Parking at the church or across the street at the McDevitt School.
item.name: Don't miss Dr. Brian Clement speaking on "7 Keys to Lifelong Sexual Vitality"
